user_query: I am planning a family trip to explore the beautiful city of Paris. Can you provide me with the nutritional analysis of the famous French dish Coq au Vin? Additionally, I would like to know the carbon footprint generated by taking a taxi for a distance of 20 kilometers within the city.

TaskList.description: Gather nutritional information for the dish Coq au Vin.
Calculate the carbon footprint for a taxi journey of 20 kilometers.
